short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: U-Assist is an extension that helps you to better understand SAP Ariba, clarifying doubts with objective answers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps you with questions regarding the SAP Ariba system, using Artificial Intelligence.
